chinese: 我准时支付(过去)这个账单
english: I paid the bill on time

english: the bill will be paid on time

english: the bill had been paid on time

english: 1. 这个问题(过去)被他解决了。 2. 这个问题将会被他解决。 3. 这个问题(已经)被他解决了。 4. 这个问题(过去已经)被他解决了。
soundmark: /这个问题(过去已经)被他解决了。/

english: 1.The problem was solved by him. 2.The problem will be solved by him. 3.The problem has been solved by him. 4.The problem had been solved by him.
